project.description:
Sync SCM build scripts and other files as needed for packaging.
Run ci_packageinstaller.pl to create PACKAGE_L4L7.
Copy build results to \\martin\archive\pv\TestCenter\4.10\Engineering_Builds\integration\BUILDVERSION
Jenkins Node(s): spccalengec01, spccalpvxpvm-01, spccalengec02
Requires L drive to be mapped to \\filer\home\qabuild

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: cd %WORKSPACE%\bin\release SET DEPENDENT_JOB_NAME=release_446_bll_windows_packaging SET CI_PACKAGE_OPT=PACKAGE_L4L7 net use /Delete L: net use L: \\filer.spirentcom.com\home\qabuild Spirent8 /user:SPIRENTCOM\qabuild rem net use L: \\filer.spirentcom.com\home\qabuild net use del /f /q "d:\p2_installer\builds\Spirent TestCenter Layer 4-7 Application.exe" rd /s /q "d:\p2_installer\builds\Spirent TestCenter Layer 4-7 Application" c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --createpropfile=yes --runcimaketarballs=no --runsetver=no --runcipackageinstaller=yes

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os import sys
if os.environ['BRANCH_NAME']=='integration': branch_id="3" if os.environ['BRANCH_NAME']=='release': branch_id="6" if os.environ['BRANCH_NAME']=='4.44_rel': branch_id="6" if '_rel' in os.environ['BRANCH_NAME']: branch_id='6'
if os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER']=='BAD_BUILD_NUMBER': os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER' ]= os.environ['BUILD_NUMBER'] bll_build_number=os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER' ] stc_maj_min_ver=os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] fullnum= "00" + bll_build_number + branch_id + "0000" buildver = "00" + bll_build_number + branch_id
if int(bll_build_number) > 9: # print "bll_build_number: greater than 9" fullnum = "0" + bll_build_number + branch_id + "0000" buildver = "0" + bll_build_number + branch_id if int(bll_build_number) > 99: # print "bll_build_number: greater than 99" fullnum = bll_build_number + branch_id + "0000" buildver = bll_build_number + branch_id il_build_number=stc_maj_min_ver + "." + buildver
# bll_build_number and il_build_number would always be the same in Jenkins bll_build_number=il_build_number il_build_number=il_build_number il_branch_name= os.environ['BRANCH_NAME'] print "BLL build number is " + bll_build_number print "IL build number is " + il_build_number paramfile = open(os.environ['WORKSPACE'] + "\properties.txt", "w") paramfile.write("BLL_BUILD_NUMBER=" + bll_build_number + "\n") paramfile.write("IL_BUILD_NUMBER=" + il_build_number + "\n") paramfile.write("BRANCH_NAME=" + il_branch_name + "\n") paramfile.close()
# check if L4L7 installer was successfully built, if not abort with error filename='\\\\martin\\archive\\pv\\TestCenter\\' + stc_maj_min_ver + '\\Engineering_Builds\\GUI_BLL\\' + il_build_number + '\\Spirent TestCenter Layer 4-7 Application.exe' if os.path.exists(filename) == True: print 'Installer file "' + filename + '" exists.' else: print 'error: Installer file "' + filename + '" DOES NOT exist, exiting with error' sys.exit(1)
